eggsplode.title: Eggsplode
eggsplode.description: If you draw this card and don't have an Unfuse, you lose the game.

unfuse.title: Unfuse
unfuse.description: Put an Eggsplode card back into the deck. Used automatically when you draw an Eggsplode card.

nope.title: Nope
nope.description: Stop the action of another card. Can be used at any time.

attegg.title: Attegg
attegg.description: End your turn without drawing and force the next player to draw twice.

favor.title: Begg
favor.description: Force another player to give you a card of their choice.

predict.title: Predict
predict.description: Look at the first 3 cards on the deck.
